Controls the swinging animation of [[entities]]' hands.

== Syntax ==
: <code>/swing [<targets>] [<mainhand|offhand>]</code>

== Arguments ==
{{argument|targets|entity}}
: Specifies entities to swing. Defaults to the command executor.
: Not all entities{{info needed|which entities?}} will animate a swing on the client side.
: {{arg desc|je=entity|amount=multiple|type=entities}}
{{cd|<mainhand{{!}}offhand>}}
: Specifies the arm to swing. Defaults to mainhand.
